1.label: Permanently protected for biodiversity
1.description: Nature reserves, research natural areas, wilderness areas, Forever Wild easements

2.label: Permanently protected to maintain a primarily natural state
2.description: National Wildlife Refuges, many State Parks, high-use National Parks

3.label: Permanently secured for multiple uses and in natural cover
3.description: State forests, lands protected from development by forest easements

39.label: Permanently secured and in agriculture or maintained grass cover

4.label: Unsecured (already developed temporary easements and/or municipal lands)
4.description: Private lands with no easements, city parks, undesignated state lands
